com.clarionmedia.infinitum.web.context

Interface InfinitumWebContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BeanProvider, InfinitumContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    XmlInfinitumWebContext

    public interface InfinitumWebContext
extends InfinitumContext, BeanProvider

    InfinitumWebContext is an extension of InfinitumContext that contains configuration information for the framework web module.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 12/26/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Detail

      • setAuthStrategy

        void setAuthStrategy(java.lang.String strategy)
                     throws InfinitumConfigurationException
        Sets the AuthenticationStrategy for this RestfulConfiguration based on one of the framework-defined strategies, such as token.
        Parameters:
        strategy - the framework-defined strategy to use
        Throws:
        InfinitumConfigurationException - if the given strategy does not exist

      • setAuthStrategy

        <T extends AuthenticationStrategy> void setAuthStrategy(T strategy)
        Sets the AuthenticationStrategy for this RestfulConfiguration.
        Parameters:
        strategy - the AuthenticationStrategy to use

      • getAuthStrategy

        Retrieves the configured AuthenticationStrategy for this RestfulConfiguration.
        Returns:
        the AuthenticationStrategy
